page.title: 16ATTITUDES IN WALKINGTON.
page.content: AFTER TRAFFIC AND BUILDING,VANDALISM CLOUDED MOST PEOPLES ATTITUDES TOWARDS THE VILLAGE.23% SHOWED CONCERN,ANOTHER 10% CITED GENERAL YOUTH BEHAVIOUR.MANY BELIEVE A SMALL GANG OF 12_16yr OLD LOCAL YOUTHS CAUSE THE ENDLESS DAMAGE TO THE TENNIS_COURTS AND PITS AND THE NEED TO SPEND Â£3000 ON THE LOCAL SPORT PAVILION.12% OF PEOPLE SAY YOUTH HAS NOTHING TO DO BUT THERE ARE MORE CLUBS THAN EVER BEFORE IN THE VILLAGE. 7% BELIEVE POLICE PRESENCE IS LACKING 3% SUGGEST A RESIDENT CONSTABLE.NOW HE LIVES 3 MILES AWAY AND ALSO COVERS TWO OTHER VILLAGES 6 MILES AWAY. 8% ARE UNHAPPY WITH LITTER PROBLEMS AGGRAVATED BY FINANCIAL CUTS AND NOT HELPED BY HEAVY PUB TRADE AND A MOBILE FISH AND CHIP VAN.THE PARISH COUNCIL PAY 2 VILLAGERS TO TIDY UP THE VILLAGE 2% HATE DOG OWNERS WHOSE PETS STILL FOUL PATHS AND GARDENS DESPITE APPEALS
